profile.name: Evan Phoenix
profile.headline: @mirendev Senior Software Engineer | Developer & Tech Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly adaptable and curious developer with a passion for learning new technologies. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including Go, Ruby, HTML, Lua, and more.

experience.title: @mirendev Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained multiple projects using Go tools and static GitOps, with a focus on scalability and reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for the mirendev/runtime project.
Improved code quality and reduced bugs through rigorous testing and debugging practices.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom keyboard firmware for various clients, utilizing C and Lua.
Created PEG parser generators using Go and Ruby, with a focus on performance and efficiency.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to multiple open source projects, including Ruby and HTML libraries.
Improved code quality and reduced bugs through rigorous testing and debugging practices.
